sentence.Network_en: The man wore a straw boater and a striped blazer which bulged over his paunch.
sentence.Network_cn: 他戴着顶硬草帽,上身带条纹的运动夹克裹着他的大肚子.

entry.def: A boater or a straw boater is a hard straw hat with a flat top and brim which is often worn for certain social occasions in the summer.

means.word_mean: 1. a stiff straw hat with a flat crown
2. someone who drives or rides in a boat

auth_sentence.content: "No we already have kayaks, rowing boats and canoes on the Cam," one explains, fiddling with his boater.

auth_sentence.content: Unhappy boater Leif Mills was not the only one to bewail the reduced space we devoted to Henley this year.

auth_sentence.content: One of the executioners even sports a festive straw boater, as if planning a day on the river.
